mapper.select: SELECT rec.receipt_id, rec.payment_method, p.pr_id, p.pr_price, r.reservation_id, r.reservation_date, rc.confirm_id, rc.confirm_date, c.crew_contact FROM receipt rec JOIN payment_request p ON rec.pr_id = p.pr_id JOIN reservation_confirmed rc ON p.confirm_id = rc.confirm_id JOIN crew c ON rc.crew_id = c.crew_id JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = rc.reservation_id WHERE rec.receipt_id = #{receiptId}

SELECT rec.receipt_id, rec.payment_method, p.pr_id, p.pr_price, r.reservation_id, r.reservation_date, rc.confirm_id, rc.confirm_date, c.crew_contact FROM receipt rec JOIN payment_request p ON rec.pr_id = p.pr_id JOIN reservation_confirmed rc ON p.confirm_id = rc.confirm_id JOIN crew c ON rc.crew_id = c.crew_id JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = rc.reservation_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT rec.receipt_id, rec.payment_method, p.pr_id, p.pr_price, r.reservation_id, r.reservation_date, r.reservation_status, rc.confirm_id, rc.confirm_date, c.crew_contact FROM receipt rec JOIN payment_request p ON rec.pr_id = p.pr_id JOIN reservation_confirmed rc ON p.confirm_id = rc.confirm_id JOIN crew c ON rc.crew_id = c.crew_id JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_id = rc.reservation_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND r.reservation_status LIKE '%'||'배달완료'||'%'
